title: rAdhikA prANanAyakA vraja
sahitya:
rAdhikA prANanAyakA vraja samAjika brndAraka


anupallavi

  jAti campaka mAlati maruvaka mA gati kEsara vanjuLa kuravaka 
jAlaka sumanacAdi viracita tamAla mAlAmiva svIkurujaya


caraNam 1    avApAga kEyura kankaNa ankuLIyaka nUpura shrngla 
mANava karatala ratna bhUSaNa manOhara gOpa vadhUjana jIvana
    caraNam 2    saugandhika sarasija hallaka nava daLa parimaLa kairava kuvalayAdi 
jAlaka sumanasAdi viracita tamAla mAlAmiva svIkurujaya
